title: Yammer: Rebranding to Viva Engage
description:
,To provide a consistent and delightful experience to our customers and users, Yammer across all its surfaces: web, mobile, and integrations (Embed, SharePoint and Outlook) will be rebranded to Viva Engage by late 2023. In the coming months you can expect Yammer to become Viva Engage through the update of brand elements like logo, app icon and name.
GA date: March CY2023
Preview date: March CY2023
